description: Because this is sandboxed, it has no access to additional codecs installed, so no mp3 audio, h.264 video, etc. You will also have limited access to the filesystem, including loss of bookmarks & external devices.
summary: Works great, except for the sandbox

description: Is now behind current stable version. Hasn't been touched in ~3-4 months now.
Enfin un raccourci pour firefox developper
summary: Enfin un raccourci pour firefox developper
